message: Let's start with a reasonable offer, Bob. I believe this split reflects the urgency for me to settle quickly due to inflation.
I understand your need for a quick settlement, Alice, but I believe this split is fairer given our differing inflation rates. Let's see if we can reach an agreement.
Bob, I appreciate your understanding of the situation.  My offer is coming down, yours needs to come up. This is a fair compromise considering the time pressure.
